title: Foundations of Mathematical Modeling for Understanding the Interaction Between Organizational Learning and Technological Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and understanding of linear regression analysis
context.additional_context: Focuses on case analysis and mathematical modeling using real corporate data

learning_goals: Learners can interpret mathematical models explaining relationships between organizational learning curves and technological innovation
Learners can apply nonlinear regression analysis results, including inverted U-shaped curves, to real-world cases
Learners can quantify the impact of technological innovation levels relative to competitors on organizational learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
